name: black-glasses
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Dark moves by 20%.
short_effect: Held: Dark-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A hold item that raises the power of DARK-type moves.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that raises the power of DARK-type moves.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An item to be held by a POKéMON. A shady-looking pair of glasses that boosts DARK-type moves.
